title: Figure 1 in Schizanthines N, O, and P, Tropane Alkaloids from the Aerial Parts ofSchizanthus tricolor
description: Figure 1. Structures of tropane alkaloids present in the genus Schizanthus: (a) angeloyl, (b) senecioyl, (c) tigloyl, (d) methylitaconyl, (e) methylmesaconyl, and (f) methylcitraconyl moieties (R1/ R2).
notes: Published as part of Humam, Munir, Kehrli, Thomas, Jeannerat, Damien, Muñoz, Orlando, Hostettmann, Kurt & Christen, Philippe, 2011, Schizanthines N, O, and P, Tropane Alkaloids from the Aerial Parts ofSchizanthus tricolor, pp. 50-53 in Journal of Natural Products 74 (1) on page 50, DOI: 10.1021/np1005423, http://zenodo.org/record/4017373
